name: Fight for Fish
description:
Fight for fish

Fight for fish is a Beat them all game. You play as Côme, a teenager who just lost Nora. You know that Nora was taken away by someone, but you don’t know who and why. Your quest to finding her will be full of adventure and enemies. Discover a story full of twists and surprises.

Controls :

↑
Move :     ←  ↓  →
Hit :   Spacebar
Pause :   P
Mute :    M
